lead_paragraph: Southampton have cleared assistant manager Eric Black of wrongdoing and closed an internal investigation after he was named in a newspaper sting that cost England boss Sam Allardyce his job in September.

headline.print_headline: Southampton Close Investigation Into Assistant Manager Black
headline.main: Southampton Close Investigation Into Assistant Manager Black

snippet: Southampton have cleared assistant manager Eric Black of wrongdoing and closed an internal investigation after he was named in a newspaper sting that cost England boss Sam Allardyce his job in September....
